summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Lisa D Hurd regarding mutual funds and internal matters at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. The communication indicates a need for manual posting of mutual funds and suggests a follow-up call.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, reaching out to Lisa Hurd for a follow-up call.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa Hurd is involved in the mutual funds process and is communicating with Amanda Kirby about the need for manual posting.

connections.description: Both are associates at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, collaborating on mutual fund postings.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 22, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is requesting a follow-up call with Lisa Hurd.
Lisa Hurd mentions that mutual funds need to be manually posted.
